Retrosheet game logs

Source: R/data.R
retro_gl_header.Rd

Retrosheet game logs for all games played in the 2011 season

Usage

retro_gl_header

retro_gl_2011

Format

An object of class spec_tbl_df (inherits from tbl_df, tbl, data.frame) with 0 rows and 161 columns.

Date

date in the form yyyymmdd

DoubleHeader

number of game

DayOfWeek

day of week

VisitingTeam

visiting team

VisitingTeamLeague

visiting league

VisitingTeamGameNumber

visiting team game number

HomeTeam

home team

HomeTeamLeague

home league

HomeTeamGameNumber

home team game number

VisitorRunsScored

visiting score

HomeRunsScore

home score

LengthInOuts

length of game in outs

DayNight

day/night indicator

CompletionInfo

completed game information

ForfeitInfo

forfeit game information

ProtestInfo

protest information

ParkID

park id

Attendence

attendance

Duration

time of game in minutes

VisitorLineScore

visiting team line score

HomeLineScore

home team line score

VisitorAB

visiting team at-bats

VisitorH

visiting team hits

VisitorD

visiting team doubles

VisitorT

visiting team triples

VisitorHR

visiting team home runs

VisitorRBI
